title: sa_jayadeva-candrāloka
body:
<body xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'>

<head>pīyuṣavarṣaśrījayadevakavikṛtaḥ
<lb/>candrālokaḥ</head>

<lg xml:id='JCand_1.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uccairasyati mandatāmarasatāṃ jāgratkalaṅkairava</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhvaṃsaṃ hastayate ca yā sumanasām ullāsinī mānase</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhṛṣṭodyanmadanāśanārcir amalā lokatrayīdarśikā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā netratritayīva khaṇḍaparaśor vāgdevatā dīvyatu</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_1.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>haṃ ho cinmayacittacandramaṇayaḥ saṃvardhayadhvaṃ rasān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>re re svairiṇi nirvicārakavite māsmat prakāśībhava</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ullāsāya vicāravīcinicayālaṅkāravārām nidheś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>candrālokamayaṃ svayaṃ vitanute pīyūṣavarṣaḥ kṛtī</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_1.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuktyāsvādyalasadrasaikavasatiḥ sāhityasārasvata</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṣīrāmbhodhir agādhatām upadadhat sevyaḥ samāśrīyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrīr asmād upadeśakauśalamayaṃ pīyūṣam asmājjagaj</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāgradbhāsurapadmakeśarayaśaḥśītāṃśur asmād budhāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_1.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taṃ pūrvācāryasūryokti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jyotiḥ stomodgamaṃ stumaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yaṃ prastūya prakāśante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madguṇās trasareṇavaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_1.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nāśaṅkanīyam eteṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>matam etena dūṣyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ tu cakṣur mṛgākṣīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kajjaleneva bhūṣyate</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_1.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratibhaiva śrutābhyāsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sahitā kavitāṃ prati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hetur mṛdambusambaddhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bījamālā latāmiva</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_1.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirdoṣā lakṣaṇavatī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarītir guṇabhūṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sālaṃkārarasāneka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vṛttir vāk kāvyanāmabhāk</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_1.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṅgīkaroti yaḥ kāvyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śabdārthāv analaṃkṛtī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asau na manyate kasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anuṣṇam analaṃ kṛtī</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_1.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vibhaktyutpattaye yogyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śāstrīyaḥ śabda iṣyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rūḍhayaugikatanmiśraiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhedaiḥ sa punas tridhā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_1.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avyaktayoganiryoga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yogābhāsais tridhādimaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te ca vṛkṣādibhūvādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>maṇḍapādyā yathākramam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_1.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śuddhatanmūlasaṃbhinna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhedair yaugikas tridhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te ca bhrāntisphuratkānti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaunteyādisvarūpiṇaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_1.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tanmiśro 'nyonyasāmānya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśeṣaparivartanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nīradhiḥ paṅkajaṃ saudhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāgaro bhūruhaḥ śaśī</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_1.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṣīranīradhir ākāśa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>paṅkajaṃ tena siddhayati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vibhaktyantaṃ padaṃ vākyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadvyūho 'rthasamāptitaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_1.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuktārthatāṃ tāṃ ca vinā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khaṇḍavākyaṃ sa iṣyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vākyaṃ ca khaṇḍavākyaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>padam ekam api kvacit</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_1.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhūmavattvād iti yathā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devety āmantraṇaṃ yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vākyāny ekārthaviśrāntāny</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āhur vākyakadambakam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_1.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anenāsāv ādyaḥ sukavijayadevena racite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mayūkhaḥ sumanasaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>syāc ceto viśatā yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sakṣatā ramaṇīyatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śabde 'rthe ca kṛtonmeṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>doṣam udghoṣayanti tam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavec chrutikaṭur varṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śravaṇodvejane paṭuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃvidrate vyākaraṇa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>viruddhaṃ cyutasaṃskṛti</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aprayuktaṃ daivatādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śabde puṃlliṅgatādikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asamarthaṃ tu hantyādeḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayogo gamanādiṣu</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa hanti hanta kāntāre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntaḥ kuṭilakuntalaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nihatārthaṃ lohitādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śoṇitādiprayogataḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyanakty anucitārthaṃ yat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padam āhus tadeva tat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyam adbhutaśākhyagra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kelikautukavānarī</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirarthakaṃ tuhītyādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūraṇaikaprayojanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arthe vidadhadityādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dadhadādyam avācakam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhatte nabhastalaṃ bhāsvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aruṇaṃ taruṇaiḥ karaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ekākṣaraṃ vinā bhūbhrū</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣmādikaṃ khatalādivat</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aślīlaṃ trividhaṃ vrīḍā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jugupsāmaṅgalātmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āhlādasādhanaṃ vāyuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntānāśe bhavet katham</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>syād dvyartham iha sandigdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nadyāṃ yānti patatriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>syād apratītaṃ śāstraika</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>gamyaṃ vītānumādivat</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śithilaṃ śayane lilye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maccitaṃ te śaśiśriyi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mastapiṣṭakaṭīloṣṭa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>gallādi grāmyam ucyate</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>neyārthaṃ lakṣaṇātyanta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasarād amanoharam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>himāṃśor hāradhikkāra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>jāgare yāmikāḥ karāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kliṣṭam artho yadīyo 'rtha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śreṇiniḥśreṇim ṛcchati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>haripriyāpitṛvadhū</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravāhapratimaṃ vacaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avimṛṣṭavidheyāṃśaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samāsapihite vidhau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśanti viśikhaprāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaṭākṣāḥ kāmināṃ hṛdi</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aparādhīna ityādi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viruddhamatikṛn matam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyasaṅgatam uttuṅga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>hāraśobhipayodharau</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rasādyanucite varṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratikūlākṣaraṃ viduḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na mām aṅgada jānāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāvaṇaṃ raṇadāruṇam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasminn upahato lupto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>visarga iha tat tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kusandhiḥ paṭav āgaccha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>visandhir nṛpatī imau</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hatavṛttam anukto 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chandodoṣaś cakāsti cet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśālalocane! paśyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>-mbaraṃ tārātaraṅgitam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nyūnaṃ tvatkhaḍgasaṃbhūta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaśaḥpuṣpaṃ nabhastaṭam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhikaṃ bhavataḥ śatrūn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daśaty asilatāphaṇī</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathitaṃ punaruktā vāk</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śyāmābjaśyāmalocanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vikṛtaṃ dūravivṛtair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aiyaruḥ kuñjarāḥ puram</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>patatprakarṣaṃ hīnānu</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāsāditve yathottaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gambhīrārambhadambholi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pāṇir eṣaḥ samāgataḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samāptapunarāttaṃ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>eṣa pīyūṣabhājanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>netrānandī tuṣārāṃśur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>udety ambudhibāndhavaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ardhāntarapadāpekṣi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>krīḍānṛtyeṣu sasmitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>moghārambhaṃ stumaḥ śambhum</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ardharambhoruvigraham</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhavanmatayogaḥ syān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na ced abhimato 'nvayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yena baddho 'mbudhir yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāmasyānucarā vayam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dviṣāṃ sampadam ācchidya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yaḥ śatrūn samapūrayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asthānasthasamāsaṃ na</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidvajjanamanoramam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mithaḥ pṛthagvākyapadaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkīrṇaṃ yat tad eva tat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaktreṇa bhrājate rātriḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntā candreṇa rājate</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>brahmāṇḍaṃ tvadyaśaḥpūra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>garbhitaṃ bhūmibhūṣaṇa</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ākarṇaya payaḥpūrṇa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>suvarṇakalaśāyate</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhagnaprakramam ārabdha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śabdanirvāhahīnatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>akramaḥ kṛṣṇa pūjyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvām anabhyarcya devatāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amatārthāntaraṃ mukhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>'mukhyenārthe virodhakṛt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tyaktahāram uraḥkṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śokenāliṅgitāṅganā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>apuṣṭārtho viśeṣye cen</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na viśeṣo viśeṣaṇāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśanti hṛdayaṃ kāntā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaṭākṣāḥ khañjanatviṣaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaṣṭaḥ spaṣṭāvabodhārtham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>akṣamo vācyasannibhaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyāhataś cedvirodhaḥ syān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mithaḥ pūrvāparārthayoḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sahasrapatramitraṃ te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaktraṃ kenopamīyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kutastatropamā yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>punaruktaḥ sudhākaraḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duṣkramagrāmyasandigdhās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>trayo doṣāḥ kramād amī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvadbhaktaḥ kṛṣṇa! gaccheyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>narakaṃ svargam eva vā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekaṃ me cumbanaṃ dehi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tava dāsyāmi kañcukam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brūta kiṃ sevyatāṃ candra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukhīcandrakirīṭayoḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anaucityaṃ kīrtilatāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taraṅgayati yaḥ sadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prasiddhyā vidyayā vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viruddhaṃ dvividhaṃ matam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nyasteyaṃ paśya kandarpa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratāpadhavaladyutiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ketakī śekhare śambhor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhatte candrakalātulām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāmānyaparivṛttiḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kuṇḍalacchavivigrahā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśeṣaparivṛttiḥ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vanitā mama cetasi</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā sahacarācāru</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>viruddhānyonyasaṃgatī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhvāṅkṣāḥ santaś ca tanayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svaṃ paraṃ ca na jānate</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarojanetra putrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukhendum avalokaya</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pālayiṣyati te gotram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asau narapurandaraḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pade tadaṃśe vākyāṃśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vākye vākyakadambake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yathānusāram abhyūhed</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>doṣān śabdārthasaṃbhavān</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>doṣam āpatitaṃ svānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prasarantaṃ viśṛṅkhalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nivārayati yas tredhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>doṣāṅkuśam uśanti tam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>doṣe guṇatvaṃ tanute</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>doṣatvaṃ vā nirasyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavantam athavā doṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nayaty atyājyatāmasau</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mukhaṃ candraśriyaṃ dhatte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śvetaśmaśrukarāṅkuraiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atra hāsyarasoddeśe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>grāmyatvaṃ guṇatāṃ gatam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tava dugdhābdhisaṃbhūteḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathaṃ jātā kalāṅkitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kavīnāṃ samayād vidyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>viruddho 'doṣatāṃ gataḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dadhāra gaurī hṛdaye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devaṃ himakarāṅkitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atra śleṣodayān naiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyājyaṃ hīti nirarthakam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_2.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvitīyas tenāsau sukavijayadevena racite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mayūkhaḥ sumanasaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_3.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alpākṣarā vicitrārtha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>khyātir akṣarasaṃhatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>uṣākāntenānugataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śūraḥ śaurir ayaṃ punaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_3.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śobhā khyātāpi yaddoṣo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇakīrtyā niṣidhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mudhā nindanti saṃsāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaṃsārir yatra pūjyate</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_3.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhimāno vicāraś ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ūhitārthaniṣedhakṛt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>indur yadi kathaṃ tīvraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sūryo yadi kathaṃ niśi</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_3.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hetus tyaktvā bahūn pakṣān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yuktyaikasyāvadhāraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nendur nārko 'yam aurvāgniḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sāgarād utthito dahan</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_3.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratiṣedhaḥ prasiddhānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāraṇānām anādaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na yuddhena bhruvoḥ spande</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>-naiva vīrā nipātitāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_3.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niruktaṃ syān nirvacanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāmnaḥ satyaṃ tathānṛtam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>īdṛśaiś caritai rājan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satyaṃ doṣākaro bhavān</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_3.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>syān mithyādhyavasāyaś ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asatī sādhyasādhane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>candrāṃśusūtragrathitāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nabhaḥpuṣpasrajaṃ vaha</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_3.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>siddhiḥ khyāteṣu cen nāma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kīrtyate tulyatoktaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yuvām eveha vikhyātau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvaṃ balair jaladhir jalaiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_3.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yuktir viśeṣasiddhiś ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vicitrārthāntarānvayāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>navas tvaṃ nīradaḥ ko 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svarṇair varṣasi yan muhuḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_3.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāryaṃ phalopalambhaś ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyāpārād vastuto 'tha vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asāv udeti śītāṃśur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mānacchedāya subhruvām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_3.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityādi lakṣaṇaṃ bhūri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāvyasyāhur maharṣayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svarṇabhrājiṣṇubhālatva</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>prabhṛtīva mahībhujaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_3.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tṛtīyas tenāsau sukavijayadevena racite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mayūkhaḥ sumanasaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_4.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śleṣo vighaṭamānārtha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghaṭamānatvavarṇanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa tu śābdaḥ sajātīyaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śabdair bandhaḥ sukhāvahaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_4.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ullasattanutāṃ nīte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>'nante pulakakaṇṭakaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhītayā mānavatyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śriyāśliṣṭaṃ hariṃ stumaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_4.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasmād antaḥsthitaḥ sarvaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svayam artho 'vabhāsate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>salilasyeva sūktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa prasāda iti smṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_4.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samatālpasamāsatvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varṇādyais tulyatātha vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śyāmalā komalā bālā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ramaṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_4.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samādhir arthamahimā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lasadghanarasātmanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>syād antarviśatā yena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gātramaṅkuritaṃ satām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_4.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mādhuryaṃ punaruktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaicitryaṃ cārutāvaham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vayasya paśya paśyāsyāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cañcalaṃ locanāñcalam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_4.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ojaḥ syāt prauḍhir arthasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkṣepo vātibhūyasaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ripuṃ hatvā yaśaḥ kṛtvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvadasiḥ kośam āviśat</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_4.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saukumāryam apāruṣyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paryāyaparivartanāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa kathāśeṣatāṃ yātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samāliṅgya marutsakham</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_4.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>udāratā tu vaidagdhyam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>agrāmyatvāt pṛthaṅmatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mānaṃ muñca priye kiṃcil</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>locanāntam udañcaya</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_4.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śṛṅgāre ca prasāde ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāntyarthavyaktisaṃgrahaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amī daśa guṇāḥ kāvye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>puṃsi śauryādayo yathā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_4.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tilakādyam iva strīṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidagdhahṛdayaṅgamam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vyatiriktam alaṅkāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakṛter bhūṣaṇaṃ girām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_4.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vicitralakṣaṇo nyāso</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirvāhaḥ prauḍhir aucitī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śāstrāntararahasyoktiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃgraho dik pradarśitā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_4.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caturthas tenāsau sukavijayadevena racite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mayūkhaḥ sumanasaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śabdārthayoḥ prasiddhyā vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaveḥ prauḍhivaśena vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hārādivad alaṅkāraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sanniveśo manoharaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svaravyañjanasaṃdoha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyūhāmandohadohadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gaur jagajjāgradutsekā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>chekānuprāsabhāsurā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āvṛttavarṇasampūrṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vṛttyanuprāsavad vacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amandānandasandoha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>svacchandāspadamandiram</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lāṭānuprāsabhūr bhinnā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>-bhiprāyā punaruktatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatra syān na punaḥ śatror</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>garjitaṃ taj jitaṃ jitam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ślokasyārdhe tadardhe vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varṇāvṛttir yadi dhruvā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadā matā matimatāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sphuṭānuprāsatā satām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upameyopamānādāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>arthānuprāsa iṣyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>candanaṃ khalu govinda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>caraṇadvandvavandanam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punaruktapratīkāśaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>punaruktārthasannibham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṃśukāntaṃ śaśī kurvann</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ambarāntam upaity asau</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āvṛttavarṇastabakaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>stavakandāṅkuraṃ kaveḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yamakaṃ prathamā dhurya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mādhuryavacaso viduḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāvyavitpravaraiścitraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>khaḍgabandhādi lakṣyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>teṣv ādyam ucyate śloka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvayīsajjanarañjikā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāminīva bhavet khaḍga</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>lekhā cārukarālikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāśmīrasekā raktāṅgī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śatrukaṇṭhāntikāśritā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upamā yatra sādṛśya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>lakṣmīr ullasati dvayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hṛdaye khelator uccais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tanvaṅgīstanayoriva</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upamānopameyatve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatraikasyaiva jāgṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>indur indurivetyādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaved evam ananvayaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paryāyeṇa dvayos tac ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upameyopamā matā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dharmo 'rtha iva pūrṇaśrīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>artho dharma iva tvayi</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vikhyātasyopamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatra syād upameyatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>indur mukham ivetyādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>syāt pratīpopamā tadā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upamāne tu līlādi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>padāḍhye lalitopamā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvannetrayugalaṃ dhatte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>līlāṃ nīlāmbujanmanoḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anekasyārthayugmasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sādṛśyaṃ stabakopamā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śrito 'smi caraṇau viṣṇor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛṅgas tāmarasaṃ yathā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>syāt saṃpūrṇopamā yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvayor api vidheyatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>padmānīva vinidrāṇi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>netrāṇy āsann aharmukhe</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatropamānacitreṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvathāpy uparajyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upameyamayī bhittis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatra rūpakam iṣyate</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samānadharmayuksādhyā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>ropāt sopādhirūpakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utsiktakṣitibhṛllakṣya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pakṣacchedapurandaraḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pṛthakkathitasādṛśyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛśyaṃ sādṛśyarūpakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ullasatpañcaśākhas te</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rājate bhujabhūruhaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>syād aṅgayaṣṭirityevaṃ</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vidham ābhāsarūpakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aṅgayaṣṭidhanurvallīty</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādi rūpitarūpakam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pariṇāmo 'nayor yasminn</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>abhedaḥ paryavasyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāntena pṛṣṭā rahasi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maunam evottaraṃ dadau</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bahubhirbahudhollekhād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekasyollekhitā matā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>strībhiḥ kāmaḥ priyaiś candraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kālaḥ śatrubhir aikṣi saḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atathyam āropayituṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathyāpāstir apahnutiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāyaṃ sudhāṃśuḥ kiṃ tarhi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyomagaṅgāsaroruham</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paryastāpahnutir yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharmamātraṃ niṣidhyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāyaṃ sudhāṃśuḥ kiṃ tarhi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sudhāṃśuḥ preyasīmukham</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhrāntāpahnutir anyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaṅkayā tathyanirṇaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāpaṃ tanoti sotkampaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jvaraḥ kiṃ na sakhi smaraḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>chekāpahnutir anyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaṅkayā tathyanihnave</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prajalpan matpade lagnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntaḥ kiṃ na hi nūpuraḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaitavāpahnutir vyakte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyājādyair nihnave padaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niryānti smaranārācāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntādṛkpātakaitavāt</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utprekṣonnīyate yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hetvādir nihnutiṃ vinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvanmukhaśrīkṛte nūnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>padmair vairāyate śaśī</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ivādikapadābhāve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gūḍhotprekṣāṃ pracakṣate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatkīrtir vibhramaśrāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viveśa svarganimnagām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>syāt smṛtibhrāntisaṃdehais</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad evālaṃkṛtitrayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṅkajaṃ paśyatas tasyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukhaṃ me gāhate manaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ayaṃ pramattamadhupas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvanmukhaṃ veda paṅkajam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṅkajaṃ vā sudhāṃśur vety</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asmākaṃ tu na nirṇayaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mīlitaṃ bahusādṛśyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhedavac cen na lakṣyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>raso nālakṣi lākṣāyāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caraṇe sahajāruṇe</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāmānyaṃ yadi sādṛśyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bheda eva na lakṣyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>padmākarapraviṣṭānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukhaṃ nālakṣi subhruvām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hetoḥ kuto 'pi vaiśiṣṭyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sphūrtir unmīlitaṃ matam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lakṣitāny udite candre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>padmāni ca mukhāni ca</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anumānaṃ ca kāryādeḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāraṇādyavadhāraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asti kiñcid yadanayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>māṃ vilokya smitaṃ manāk</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arthāpattiḥ svayaṃ sidhyet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>padārthāntaravarṇanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa jitas tvanmukhenenduḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kā vārtā sarasīruhām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>syāt kāvyaliṅgaṃ vāgartho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nūtanārthasamarthakaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jito 'si manda kandarpa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>maccitte 'sti trilocanaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṅkāraḥ parikaraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sābhiprāye viśeṣaṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sudhāṃśukalitottaṃsas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāpaṃ haratu vaḥ śivaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sābhiprāye viśeṣye tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavet parikarāṅkuraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caturṇāṃ puruṣārthānāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dātā devaś caturbhujaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>akramātiśayoktiś ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yugapat kāryakāraṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āliṅganti samaṃ deva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jyāṃ śarāś ca parāś ca te</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atyantātiśayoktis tat</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>paurvāparyavyatikrame</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agre māno gataḥ paścād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anunītā priyeṇa sā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>capalātiśayoktis tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kārye hetuprasaktije</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yāmīti priyapṛṣṭāyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>valayo 'bhavad ūrmikā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sambandhātiśayoktiḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadabhāve 'pi tadvacaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paśya saudhāgrasaṃsaktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vibhāti vidhumaṇḍalam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhedakātiśayoktiś ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekasyaivānyatocyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aho anyaiva lāvaṇya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>līlā bālākucasthale</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rūpakātiśayoktiś ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rūpyaṃ rūpakamadhyagam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paśya nīlotpaladvandvān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niḥsaranti śitāḥ śarāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prauḍhoktis tadaśaktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tacchaktatvāvakalpanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kalindajātīraruhāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śyāmalāḥ saraladrumāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sambhāvanaṃ yadītthaṃ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ity ūhonyaprasiddhaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>siktaṃ sphaṭikakumbhāntaḥ</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthitiśvetīkṛtair jalaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='e'>mauktikaṃ cel latāṃ sūte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='f'>tatpuṣpais te samaṃ yaśaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vāñchitād adhikaprāptir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ayatnena praharṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīpam uddyotayed yāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvad abhyudito raviḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>iṣyamāṇaviruddhārtha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>samprāptis tu viṣādanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīpam uddyotayed yāvat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāvan nirvāṇa eva saḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kriyādibhir anekasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tulyatā tulyayogitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṅkucanti sarojāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svairiṇīvadanāni ca</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='e'>prācīnācalacūḍāgra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='f'>cumbibimbe sudhākare</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prastutāprastutānāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tulyatve dīpakaṃ matam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>medhāṃ budhaḥ sudhām indur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bibharti vasudhāṃ bhavān</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āvṛtte dīpakapade</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhaved āvṛttidīpakam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīptyāgnir bhāti bhātīnduḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntyā bhāti ravis tviṣā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vākyayor arthasāmānye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prativastūpamā matā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tāpena bhrājate sūraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śūraś cāpena rājate</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ced bimbapratibimbatvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭāntas tadalaṃkṛtiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>syān mallapratimallatve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṅgrāmoddhāmahuṃkṛtiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛṣṭāntaś ced bhavanmūrtis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tan mṛṣṭā daivadurlipiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jātā cet prāk prabhā bhānos</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tarhi yātā vibhāvarī</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vākyārthayoḥ sadṛśayor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aikyāropo nidarśanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yā dātuḥ saumyatā seyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sudhāṃśor akalaṅkatā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyatireko viśeṣaś ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upamānopameyayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śailā ivonnatāḥ santaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ tu prakṛtikomalāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sahoktiḥ sahabhāvaś ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāsate janarañjanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>digantam agamad yasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kīrtiḥ pratyarthibhiḥ saha</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vinoktiś ced vinā kiṃcit</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prastutaṃ hīnam ucyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vidyā hṛdyāpi sāvadyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>binā vinayasampadam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samāsoktiḥ parisphūrtiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prastute 'prastutasya cet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayam aindrīmukhaṃ paśya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>raktaś cumbati candramāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>khaṇḍaśleṣaḥ padānāṃ ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ekaikaṃ pṛthagarthatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ucchaladbhūrikīlālaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śuśubhe vāhinīpatiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhaṅgaśleṣaḥ padastomasy</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>-aiva cet pṛthagarthatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ajarāmaratā kasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāyodhyeva purī priyā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arthaśleṣo 'rthamātrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yady anekārthasaṃśrayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuṭilāḥ śyāmalā dīrghā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaṭākṣāḥ kuntalāś ca te</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aprastutapraśaṃsā syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā yatra prastutānugā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāryakāraṇasāmānya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśeṣāder asau matā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kamalaiḥ kamalāvāsaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kiṃ kiṃ nāsādi sundaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apy ambudheḥ paraṃ pāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prayānti vyavasāyinaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhaved arthāntaranyaso</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>'nuṣaktārthāntarābhidhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hanūmān abdhim atarad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>duṣkaraṃ kiṃ mahātmanām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yasmin viśeṣasāmānya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>viśeṣāḥ sa vikasvaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa na jigye mahānto hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>durdharṣāḥ kṣmādharā iva</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāryādyaiḥ prastutair uktaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paryāyoktiṃ pracakṣate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tṛṇāny aṅkurayāmāsa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vipakṣanṛpasadmasu</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>uktir vyājastutir nindā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>stutibhyāṃ stutinindayoḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaste viveko nayasi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svargaṃ pātakino 'pi yat</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākṣepas tu prayuktasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pratiṣedho vicāraṇāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>candra saṃdarśayātmānam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>athavāsti priyāmukham</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gūḍhākṣepo vidhau vyakte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣedhe cāsphuṭe sati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hara sītāṃ sukhaṃ, kiṃ tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cintayāntakaḍhaukanam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>virodho 'nupapattiś ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇadravyakriyādiṣu</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amandacandanasyandaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svacchandaṃ dandahīti mām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śleṣādibhūr virodhaś ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>virodhābhāsatā matā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>apy andhakāriṇānena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jagad etat prakāśate</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asaṃbhavo 'rthaniṣpattāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>asaṃbhāvyatvavarṇanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ko veda gopaśiśukaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śailam utpāṭayiṣyati</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vibhāvanā vināpi syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāraṇaṃ kāryajanma cet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paśya lākṣārasāsiktaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>raktaṃ tvaccaraṇadvayam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśeṣoktir anutpattiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāryasya sati kāraṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>namantam api dhīmantaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na laṅghayati kaścana</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ākhyāte bhinnadeśatve</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāryahetvor asaṃgatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvadbhaktānāṃ namaty aṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhaṅgam eti bhavaklamaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viṣamaṃ yady anaucityād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anekānvayakalpanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kvātitīvraviṣāḥ sarpāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kvāsau candanabhūruhaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samam aucityato 'neka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vastusambandhavarṇanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anurūpaṃ kṛtaṃ sadma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hāreṇa kucamaṇḍalam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vicitraṃ cet prayatnaḥ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viparītaphalapradaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>namanti santas trailokyād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>api labdhuṃ samunnatim</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adhikaṃ bodhyam ādhārād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ādheyādhikavarṇanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yayā vyāptaṃ jagat tasyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vāci mānti na te guṇāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyonyaṃ nāma yatra syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>upakāraḥ parasparam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>triyāmā śaśinā bhāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaśī bhāti triyāmayā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśeṣaḥ khyātam ādhāraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vināpy ādheyavarṇanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gate 'pi sūrye dīpasthās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tamaś chindanti tatkarāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>syād vyāghāto 'nyathākāri</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vastv anyakriyam ucyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yair jagat prīyate hanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tair eva kusumāyudhaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gumphaḥ kāraṇamālā syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yathāprākprāntakāraṇaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nayena śrīḥ śriyā tyāgas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tyāgena vipulaṃ yaśaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gṛhītamuktarītyartha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śreṇir ekāvalī matā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>netre karṇāntaviśrānte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>karṇau dormūladolinau</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dīpakaikāvalīyogān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mālādīpakam ucyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smareṇa hṛdaye tasyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tena tvayi kṛtā sthitiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāro nāma padotkarṣaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sāratāyā yathottaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāraṃ sārasvataṃ tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāvyaṃ tatra śivastavaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>udārasāraś ced bhāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhinno 'bhinnatayā guṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>madhuraṃ madhu pīyūṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasmāt tasmāt kaver vacaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathāsaṃkhyaṃ dvidhārthāś cet</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kramādekaikamanvitāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śatruṃ mitraṃ dviṣatpakṣaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jaya rañjaya bhañjaya</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>paryāyaś ced anekatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>syād ekasya samanvayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>padmaṃ muktvā gatā candraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāminīvadanopamā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parivṛttir vinimayo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nyūnābhyadhikayor mithaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jagrāhaikaṃ śaraṃ muktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaṭākṣān śatruyoṣitām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parisaṃkhyā niṣidhyaikam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anyasmin vastuyantraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>snehakṣayaḥ pradīpeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svānteṣu na natabhruvām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vikalpas tulyabalayor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>virodhaś cāturīyutaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāntācitte 'dhare vāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuru tvaṃ vītarāgatām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.96'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhūyasām ekasambandha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhājāṃ gumphaḥ samuccayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>naśyanti paścāt paśyanti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhraśyanti ca tava dviṣaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samādhiḥ kāryasaukaryaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāraṇāntarasannidheḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>utkaṇṭhitāṃ ca kalayan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jagāmāstaṃ ca bhānumān</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratyanīkaṃ balavataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śatroḥ pakṣe parākramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>jaitranetrānugau karṇāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utpalābhyām adhaḥkṛtau</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pratīpam upamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hīnatvam upameyataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dṛṣṭaṃ ced vadanaṃ tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃ padmena kimindunā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ullāso 'nyamahimnā ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>doṣo hy anyatra varṇyate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad abhāgyaṃ dhanasyaiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yan nāśrayati sajjanam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tadguṇaḥ svaguṇatyāgād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>anyataḥ svaguṇodayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>padmarāgāruṇaṃ nāsā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mauktikaṃ te 'dharaśritam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>punaḥ svaguṇasamprāptir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vijñeyā pūrvarūpatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harakaṇṭhāṃśulipto 'pi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śeṣas tvadyaśasā sitaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadvastuno 'nyathā rūpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā syāt pūrvarūpatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dīpe nirvāpite hy āsīt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāñcīratnair aharmahaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.104'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṅgatānyaguṇānaṅgī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāram āhur atadguṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśann api raver madhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śīta eva sadā śaśī</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.105'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prāksiddhasvaguṇotkarṣo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>'nuguṇaḥ parasannidheḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karṇotpalāni dadhate</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kaṭākṣairapi nīlatām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.106'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avajñā varṇyate vastu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>guṇadoṣākṣamaṃ yadi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mlāyanti yadi padmāni</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kā hānir amṛtadyuteḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.107'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>praśnottaraṃ krameṇoktau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>syūtam uttaram uttaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yatrāsau vetasī pāntha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tatrāsau sutarā sarit</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.108'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pihitaṃ paravṛttānta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>jñātur anyasya ceṣṭitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>priye gṛhāgate prātaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kāntā talpam akalpayat</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.109'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyājoktiḥ śaṅkamānasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>chadmanā vastugopanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakhi paśya gṛhārāma</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>parāgair asmi dhūsarā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.110'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vakroktiḥ śleṣakākubhyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vācyārthāntarakalpanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>muñca mānaṃ dinaṃ prāptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>manda nandī harāntike</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.111'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svābhāvoktiḥ svabhāvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jātyādiṣu ca varṇanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuraṅgair uttaraṅgākṣi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>stabdhakarṇair udīkṣyate</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.112'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāvikaṃ bhūtabhāvyartha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>sākṣād darśanavarṇanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃ vilokayādyāpi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yuddhyante 'tra surāsurāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.113'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>deśātmaviprakṛṣṭasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>darśanaṃ bhāvikacchaviḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvaṃ vasan hṛdaye tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sākṣāt pañceṣur īkṣyase</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.114'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>udāttam ṛddheś caritaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ślāghyaṃ cānyopalakṣaṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sānau yasyābhavad yuddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad dhūrjaṭikirīṭinoḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.115'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atyuktir adbhutātathya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śauryaudāryādivarṇanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvayi dātari rājendra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yācakāḥ kalpaśākhinaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.116'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rasabhāvatadābhāsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhāvaśāntinibandhanāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rasavatpreyaūrjasvi</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>samāhitamayābhidhāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.117'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāvānāmudayaḥ sandhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śabalatvam iti trayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṅkārān imān sapta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kecid āhur manīṣiṇaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.118'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śuddhir ekapradhānatvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathā saṃsṛṣṭisaṃkarau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eteṣām eva vinyāsān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nālaṅkārāntarāṇy amī</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.119'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarveṣāṃ ca pratidvandva</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>praticchandabhidābhṛtām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upādhiḥ kvacid udbhinnaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>syād anyatrāpi saṃbhavāt</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.120'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mālā paraṃparā caiṣāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhūyasām anukūlake</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>manuṣye bhavataḥ kvāpi hy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>alaṅkārāṅgatāṃ gate</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.121'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śabde padārthe vākyārthe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vākyārthastabake tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ete bhavanti vinyāsāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svabhāvātiśayātmakāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.122'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kasyāpy atiśayasyokter</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ity anvarthavicāraṇāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prāyeṇāmī hy alaṃkārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhinnā nātiśayoktitaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.123'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃkārapradhāneṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dadhāneṣv api sāmyatām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vailakṣaṇyaṃ prativyakti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratibhāti mukheṣviva</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.124'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>alaṃkāreṣu tathyeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yady anāsthā manīṣiṇām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tad arvācīnabhedeṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nāmnāṃ nāmnāya iṣyatām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_5.125'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caturthaḥ saikoyam sukavijayadevena racite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mayūkhaḥ sumanasaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ālambanoddīpanātmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vibhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ dvidhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāryo 'nubhāvo bhāvaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahāyo vyabhicāry api</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>galadvedyāntarodbhedo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hṛdayeṣv ajaḍātmanām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>milan malayajālepa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ivāhlādaṃ vikāsayan</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāvye nāṭye ca kārye ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vibhāvādyair vibhāvitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āsvādyamānaikatanuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthāyī bhāvo rasaḥ smṛtaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ratyākhyasthāyibhāvātmā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vallabhādivibhāvitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ālasyerṣyājugupsābhyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vinā saṃcāribhir yutaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anubhāvaiḥ kaṭākṣādyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>unmādādyair yathākramam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sambhogo vipralambhaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śṛṅgāro dvividho mataḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>hāsasthāyī raso hāsyo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vibhāvadyair yathākramam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vairūpyaphullagaṇḍatvā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>-vahitthādyaiḥ samanvitaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>abhīṣṭaviprayogāśru</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>pātaglānyādibhiḥ kramāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vibhāvādyair yutaḥ śoka</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthāyī syāt karuṇo rasaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>krodhasthāyī raso raudro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vibhāvādyaiḥ samanvitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mātsaryahastaniṣpeṣa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃmohādyair yathākramam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>utsāhākhyasthāyibhāvaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhāvādivibhāvabhūḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vīro 'nubhāvaiḥ sthairyādyair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāvair garvādibhiryutaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyāghrādibhir vibhāvais tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vepitādyanubhāvabhṛt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāvair mohādibhir yukto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhayasthāyī bhayānakaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthāyī jugupsā bībhatso</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vibhāvādyā yathākramam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>aniṣṭekṣaṇaniṣṭhīva</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mohādyā yatra saṃmatāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>adbhuto vismayasthāyī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>māyādikavibhāvabhūḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>romāñcādyanubhāvo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>stambhādivyabhicārikaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirvedasthāyikaḥ śāntaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>satsaṅgādivibhāvabhūḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣamādikānubhāvo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>stambhādivyabhicārikaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ratir devādiviṣayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>santi ca vyabhicāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vedyamānā nigadyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāvāḥ sāhityavedibhiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirvedaglāniśaṅkākhyās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tathāsūyāmadaśramāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ālasyaṃ caiva dainyaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cintā mohaḥ smṛtir dhṛtiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vrīḍā capalatā harṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āvego jaḍatā tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>garvo viṣāda autsukyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nidrāpasmāra eva ca</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>suptaṃ prabodho 'marṣaś cāpy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>avahittham athogratā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>matir vyādhis tathonmādas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathā maraṇam eva ca</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>trāsaś caiva vitarkaś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vijñeyā vyabhicāriṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trayastriṃśad ime bhāvāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samākhyātās tu nāmataḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvasādhāraṇaprema</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>praśrayādisvarūpayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anaucityā rasābhāsā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāvābhāsāś ca kīrtitāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhāvasya śāntir udayaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sandhiḥ śabalatā tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kāvyasya kāñcanasyeva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuṅkumaṃ kāntisaṃpade</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>āturyam āsaptamaṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>yatheṣṭair aṣṭamādibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samāsaḥ syāt padair na syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samāsaḥ sarvathāpi ca</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pāñcālikī ca lāṭīyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gauḍīyā ca yathārasam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaidarbhī ca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>catasro rītayaḥ smṛtāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>madhurāyāṃ samākrāntā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vargasthāḥ pañcamair nijaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lakāraś ca lasaṃyukto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hrasvavyavahitau raṇau</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rephākrāntā vargyayaṇāṣ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ṭavargāt pañcamād ṛte</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kapākrāntas tavargaḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prauḍhāyāṃ ca kamūrdhatā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarvair ūrdhvaiḥ sakārasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvai rephasya sarvathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rahor dvedhā tu saṃyogaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paruṣāyāṃ śaṣau svataḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lakāro 'nyair asaṃyukto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>laghavo ghabhadhā rasau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lalitāyāṃ tathā śeṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhadrāyām iti vṛttayaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aṅgabhaṅgollasallīlā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taruṇī smaratoraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tarkakarkaśapūrṇokti</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāptotkaṭadhiyāṃ vṛthā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vīpsotsarpanmukhāgrārdraṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>barhī jahre kṛśas tṛṣam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lalanā rabhasaṃ dhatte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ghanāṭope mahīyasi</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_6.29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayūkhastenāsau sukavijayadevena racite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mahati ṛtusaṃkhyaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_7.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vṛttibhedais tribhir yuktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>srotobhiriva jāhnavī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhāratī bhāti gambhīrā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kuṭilā saralā kvacit</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_7.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sāṃmukhyaṃ vidadhānāyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sphuṭam arthāntare giraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaṭākṣa iva lolākṣyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyāpāro vyañjanātmakaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_7.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avivakṣitavācyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvau bhedau vācyam eva cet</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arthāntire saṃkramitam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atyantaṃ vā tiraskṛtam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_7.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvau vivakṣitavācyasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lakṣyālakṣyakramātmakau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>catvāriṃśadyutaikena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhedāḥ ṣaṭ cānayoḥ kramāt</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_7.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tridhā śabdārthatadyugma</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaktijanmā sphuṭakramāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rasabhāvatadābhāsa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>pramukhas tv asphuṭakramāt</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_7.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vastvalaṅkārayor vyakter</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhedau dvau śabdaśaktijau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arthaśaktisamutthasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhedā dvādaśa tad yathā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_7.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>catvāro vastv alaṃkāram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>alaṃkāras tu vastu yat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>alaṃkāram alaṃkāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vastu vastu vyanakti tat</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_7.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vaktuḥ kavinibaddhasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaver vā prauḍhinirmitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svasiddho vā vyañjako 'rthaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>catvāras triguṇās tataḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_7.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śabdārthobhayabhūr ekaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa ca vākyaikasaṃśrayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>padaikadeśe racanā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>varṇavākyapadeṣv api</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_7.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prabandhe ceti ṣoḍhāsau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rasādyākhyo 'sphuṭakramaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣu saptadaśasv ekaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parityajyāsphuṭakramam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_7.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ye ṣoḍaśādyā dviguṇās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>te syur vākyapadāśrayāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prabandhe 'pi dvādaśa syur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arthaśaktibhuvo bhidaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_7.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dvātriṃśad dvādaśaikaḥ ṣaṭ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sarvasaṃkalitadhvaneḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhedāḥ syur ekapañcāśat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbhinnās tu sahasraśaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_7.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vaktṛsyūtaṃ bodhayituṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vyaṅgyaṃ vaktur abhīpsitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svāṅkuritam atadrūpaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svayam ullasitaṃ giraḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_7.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kaścit sādhāraṇaḥ kaścid</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āmantrya pratibodhitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaścit taṭasthaḥ kaścic ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bodhitapratibodhitaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_7.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ityevaṃ boddhṛvaicitryād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaktṛsyūtaṃ caturvidham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>upekṣānihnavābhyāṃ ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dvidhā svāṅkuritaṃ matam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_7.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhūtādikālabhedena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nihnavaḥ syād anekadhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anenāpi prabhedena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyaktivallī vijṛmbhate</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_7.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nānāprabhedā niyatā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kvacit prakaraṇādinā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>arthe 'rtham anyaṃ yaṃ vakti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tad vācyavyaṅgyam iṣyate</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_7.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayūkhastenāsau sukavijayadevena racite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mahati munisaṃkhyaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_8.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad vyajyamānaṃ manasaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>staimityāya sa no dhvaniḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anyathā tu guṇībhūta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyaṅgyam āpatitaṃ tridhā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_8.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vyaktir eva kvacid vyaṅgyaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kvacid arthasvabhāvataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kvacic cārutarasyāgre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa vimuñcati cārutām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_8.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>agūḍhaṃ kalayed arthā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>-ntarasaṃkramitādikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vismṛtaḥ kim apāṃnātha</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa tvayā kumbhasaṃbhavaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_8.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aparasya rasādeś ced</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aṅgamanyad rasādikam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>hā hā! matkucakāśmīra</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>liptaṃ bhinnam uraḥ śaraiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_8.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā vācyasya siddhyaṅgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>naur artho vāridher yathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃśritya taraṇiṃ dhīrās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>taranti vyādhivāridhīn</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_8.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asphuṭaṃ stanayor atra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kokasādṛśyavan matam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuṅkumāktaṃ stanadvandvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mānasaṃ mama gāhate</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_8.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saṃdigdhaṃ yadi saṃdeho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dairghyādyutpalayoriva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saṃprāpte nayane tasyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śravaṇottaṃsabhūmikām</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_8.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tulyaprādhānyam indutvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iva vācyena sāmyabhṛt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kānte tvadānanarucā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>glānim eti saroruham</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_8.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asundaraṃ yadi vyaṅgyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>syād vācyād amanoharam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarasyāmīladambhoje</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cakraḥ kāntāṃ vilokate</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_8.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kākusthaṃ praṇato 'mbhodhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>adya mādyatu rāvaṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ity aṣṭadhā guṇībhūta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyaṅgyam aṅgīkṛtaṃ budhaiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_8.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayūkhastenāsau sukavijayadevena racite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ candrāloke mahati vasusaṃkhyaḥ sukhayatu</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_9.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mukhyārthasyāvivakṣāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pūrvārvācī ca rūḍhitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prayojanāc ca saṃbaddhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vadantī lakṣaṇā matā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_9.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lakṣaṇīyasvaśabdasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mīlanāmīlanād dvidhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lakṣaṇā sā tridhā siddha</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>sādhyasādhyāṅgabhedataḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_9.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sphuṭāsphuṭaprabhedena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prayojanam api dvidhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viduḥ sphuṭaṃ taṭasthatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arthagatvād dvidhā budhāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_9.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asphuṭaṃ cārthaniṣṭhatvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṭasthatvād api dvidhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>lakṣyalakṣakaniṣṭhatvād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arthasaṃstham api dvidhā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_9.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lakṣakasthaṃ sphuṭaṃ yatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sā vicakṣaṇalakṣaṇā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asphuṭatvaṃ taṭasthatvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>lakṣyasthatvam amuṣya ca</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_9.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyās tisra iti vyaktā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śaktitaḥ sā caturvidhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>indur evaiṣa tadvaktram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>utkarṣo lakṣyate mukhe</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_9.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pradīpaṃ vardhayetyatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taṭasthaṃ maṅgalodayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paṭo 'yaṃ dagdha ityādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sphuṭaṃ nāsti prayojanam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_9.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amṛtaṃ sūktam ityādau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lakṣyastham atihṛdyatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ābhimukhyāt saṃnidhānāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tathākārapratītitaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_9.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kāryakāraṇabhāvāt sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vācyavācakabhāvataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ityevamādeḥ saṃbandhāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kiṃcānyasmāc catuṣṭayāt</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_9.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sādṛśyāt samavāyāt sā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaiparītyāt kriyānvayāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sāropādhyavasānākhye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>gauṇaśuddhe pṛthak pṛthak</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_9.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gauṇaṃ sāropam uddiṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>indur mukham itīdṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gauṇaṃ sādhyavasānaṃ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>indur evedam īdṛśam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_9.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śuddhaṃ sāropam uddiṣṭam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>āyur ghṛtam itīdṛśam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śuddhaṃ sādhyavasānaṃ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>āyur evedam īdṛśam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_9.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>upādānārpaṇadvāre</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dve cānye iti ṣaḍvidhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kuntā viśanti gaṅgāyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ghoṣo nivasatīti ca</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_9.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lakṣyalakṣakavaiśiṣṭya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaiśiṣṭyād dvividhā punaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sarasaṃ kāvyam amṛtaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidyā sthirataraṃ dhanam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_9.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathā sahetur atathā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>-bhedabhinnā ca kutracit</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>saundaryeṇaiṣa kandarpaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sā ca mūrtimatī ratiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_9.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śabde padārthe vākyārthe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃkhyāyāṃ kārake tathā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>liṅge ceyam alaṅkārā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>-ṅkurabījatayā sthitā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_9.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayūkhastenāsau sukavijayadevena racite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ candrāloke mahati navasaṃkhyaḥ sukhayatu</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_10.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmaṃ kaṃcit puraskṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prāyaḥ śabdaḥ pravartate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yayārthaṃ spaṣṭam ācaṣṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śabdas tām abhidhāṃ viduḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_10.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jātyā guṇena kriyayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vastuyogena saṃjñayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nirdeśena tathā prāhuḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ṣaḍvidhām abhidhāṃ budhāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_10.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gaur nīlaḥ pācako daṇḍī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ḍitthaḥ kaṃsa iti kramāt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kaṃ saṃhinasti kaṃsārir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>naraṃ ca kaṃ samāśritam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_10.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na yogāder āyatanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na saṅketaniketanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vṛttyā nirdeśaśabdo 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukhyayā svābhidheyayā</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_10.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pīyūṣavarṣaprabhavaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>candrālokamanoharam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sudhānidhānam āsādya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śrayadhvaṃ vibudhā mudam</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_10.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jayanti yājñikaśrīman</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahādevāṅgajanmanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sūktipīyūṣavarṣasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jayadevakaver giraḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='JCand_10.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mayūkhas tenāsau sukavijayadevena racite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ciraṃ candrāloke mahati daśasaṃkhyaḥ sukhayatu</seg> //</l>
</lg>

  </body>
